profile:
Waterproofing Contractors Serving all of Okotoks to Foremost, Alberta


Affordable Basement Solutions & Waterproofing began with the flooding of my basement. I got a quote from my competition and it was an amount that I couldn't afford at the time. I then decided to research the product and the installation process. I found a supplier overseas and a reputable mentor. I then installed this system in my own home and decided I would like to help out others who have the same problem, but at more affordable pricing.


To date, my home and every other leaky basement I have ever worked on are completely dry. I went into business not just to become financially stable, but to help people with flooded basements. I have done jobs that were given to me over other waterproofing & foundation contractors because I provide the same service at a fraction of the cost.


I specialize in waterproofing basements and I'm confident in the work and solutions I provide. If you are looking for a basement waterproofing service or are simply looking for an affordable basement crack repair service, please contact me today. I am one of the most trusted waterproofing contractors in the area and service all of Okotoks to Foremost, Alberta.
services:
Basement Waterproofing
Basement Crack Repair
Flooded Basements
Photos
